markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Plentiful Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=2078) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 194 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=78)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2074)

</column>

---

You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients. Double the number of prepared snares granted by Snarecrafter Dedication.
name: Plentiful Snares
